inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Light Hammer', 'Damage', 15); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Warhammer', 'Damage', 15); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Maul', 'Damage', 15); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Advanced Training, Hammers
description: You gain an additional +15 to damage with light hammers, warhammers, and mauls.
